sentences.en: A Dragon Tombstone is the crown of Necropolis development, the ultimate goal to strive for.
sentences.cn: 飞龙墓碑是亡灵发展的巅峰, 是奋斗的终极目标.

sentences.en: All told, more than 10,000 mummies may be buried in the ancient necropolis.
sentences.cn: 据告知, 在这个古代大墓里有10,000具木乃伊被埋葬.

sentences.en: Experts have said the necropolis was destined for high - ranking personalities - such as warriors and ancient priests.
sentences.cn: 有关专家还表示,这个墓地埋葬的都是一些地位较高的人物 —— 如战士和古代的牧师等.

sentences.en: It was the first skeleton to be found in the 3,000 - year - old necropolis, she said.
sentences.cn: 德桑蒂斯说, 这是这个有3000年历史的墓地中发现的首具人类骸骨.

sentences.en: It was then that they discovered the second century necropolis.
sentences.cn: 就在这个时候,他们发现了公元二世纪时的墓地.

sentences.en: On the battlefield, Necropolis troops are generally weaker than their opponents.
sentences.cn: 在战场上, 亡灵部队一般都要比它们的敌人弱小.

sentences.en: Perhaps originally a sanctuary, it became a necropolis in prehistoric times.
sentences.cn: 这座地下宫殿可能曾是避难所, 但从史前时期起成为了大墓地.

sentences.en: the extensive necropolis which served the Etruscan city of Caere
sentences.cn: 伊特鲁里亚塞雷古城的大型公墓

sentences.en: The Necropolis floats above the city of Stratholme.
sentences.cn: 纳克萨玛斯墓地是漂浮在斯坦索姆城市上空的.

sentences.en: The necropolis was located on a hill outside the city of Rome.
sentences.cn: 墓地位于罗马城外的一座小山上.

sentences.en: Will of the Necropolis now cannot occur more often than once every 15 sec.
sentences.cn: 这个是啥?墓地之愿?现在有内置冷却,15秒.

trans.tran_en: an area of land where dead people are buried, especially a large ancient one
